mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INGREDIENT (category, name, name_eng, flavor, explanation, photo) VALUES(#{category}, #{name}, #{name_eng}, #{flavor}, #{explanation}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_id as id, category, name, name_eng, flavor, explanation FROM INGREDIENT WHERE 1=1 LIMIT 0, 50;
mapper.update: UPDATE INGREDIENT SET category = #{category}, name = #{name}, name_eng = #{nameEng}, flavor = #{flavor}, explanation = #{explanation}, photo = #{photo} WHERE 1=1 AND ingredient_id = #{id}
